com.temp.cam.camerasdk.library.filter

Class GPUImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.temp.cam.camerasdk.library.filter.GPUImage

  • public class GPUImage
extends java.lang.Object
    The main accessor for GPUImage functionality. This class helps to do common tasks through a simple interface.

      • setUpCamera

        public void setUpCamera(android.hardware.Camera camera,
                        int degrees,
                        boolean flipHorizontal,
                        boolean flipVertical)
        Sets the up camera to be connected to GPUImage to get a filtered preview.
        Parameters:
        camera - the camera
        degrees - by how many degrees the image should be rotated
        flipHorizontal - if the image should be flipped horizontally
        flipVertical - if the image should be flipped vertically

      • setScaleType

        public void setScaleType(GPUImage.ScaleType scaleType)
        This sets the scale type of GPUImage. This has to be run before setting the image. If image is set and scale type changed, image needs to be reset.
        Parameters:
        scaleType - The new ScaleType

      • getBitmapWithFilterApplied

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmapWithFilterApplied(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Gets the given bitmap with current filter applied as a Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - the bitmap on which the current filter should be applied
        Returns:
        the bitmap with filter applied

      • getBitmapForMultipleFilters

        public static void getBitmapForMultipleFilters(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                               java.util.List<GPUImageFilter> filters,
                                               GPUImage.ResponseListener<android.graphics.Bitmap> listener)
        Gets the images for multiple filters on a image. This can be used to quickly get thumbnail images for filters.
        Whenever a new Bitmap is ready, the listener will be called with the bitmap. The order of the calls to the listener will be the same as the filter order.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - the bitmap on which the filters will be applied
        filters - the filters which will be applied on the bitmap
        listener - the listener on which the results will be notified

      • saveToPictures

        @Deprecated
public void saveToPictures(java.lang.String folderName,
                                       java.lang.String fileName,
                                       GPUImage.OnPictureSavedListener listener)
        Deprecated. 
        Deprecated: Please use GPUImageView#saveToPictures(String, String, DrawingImageView.co.cyberagent.android.gpuimage.GPUImageView.OnPictureSavedListener) Save current image with applied filter to Pictures. It will be stored on the default Picture folder on the phone below the given folderName and fileName.
        This method is async and will notify when the image was saved through the listener.
        Parameters:
        folderName - the folder name
        fileName - the file name
        listener - the listener

      • saveToPictures

        @Deprecated
public void saveToPictures(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                       java.lang.String folderName,
                                       java.lang.String fileName,
                                       GPUImage.OnPictureSavedListener listener)
        Deprecated. 
        Deprecated: Please use GPUImageView#saveToPictures(String, String, DrawingImageView.co.cyberagent.android.gpuimage.GPUImageView.OnPictureSavedListener) Apply and save the given bitmap with applied filter to Pictures. It will be stored on the default Picture folder on the phone below the given folerName and fileName.
        This method is async and will notify when the image was saved through the listener.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - the bitmap
        folderName - the folder name
        fileName - the file name
        listener - the listener
